verses.name: Matthew 18:16
verses.text: But if he will not hear thee, then take with thee one or two more, that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established.

verses.name: Matthew 18:17
verses.text: And if he shall neglect to hear them, tell it unto the church: but if he neglect to hear the church, let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican.

verses.name: Matthew 18:18
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
